edu.ntnu.sair.controller

Class ReportController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ntnu.sair.controller.ReportController

  • @RequestMapping(value="/report")
 @Controller
public class ReportController
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by chun on 3/5/15.
    ReportController: Offer the interfaces for the client to report the reports from the server by REST.

      • sendLocationReport

        @Scope(value="prototype")
 @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/sendLocationReport",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String sendLocationReport(@RequestParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="uuid")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String uuid,
                                                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="longitude")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String longitude,
                                                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="latitude")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String latitude,
                                                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="sendingTime")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String sendingTime)
        Offer the interface for the client to send location report to the server
        Parameters:
        username - username for the user
        uuid - unique id for the user together with device id
        sendingTime - timestamp when sent from client
        latitude - latitude of the location
        longitude - longitude of the location
        Returns:
        result with string type as a json or a xml format

      • sendPhotoReport

        @Scope(value="prototype")
 @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/sendPhotoReport",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String sendPhotoReport(@RequestParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="uuid")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String uuid,
                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="sendingTime")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String sendingTime,
                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="latitude")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String latitude,
                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="longitude")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String longitude,
                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="direction")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String direction,
                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="file")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String file,
                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="extension")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String extension,
                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="title")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String title,
                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="description")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String description)
        Offer the interface for the client to send photo report to the server
        Parameters:
        username - username for the user
        uuid - unique id for the user together with device id
        sendingTime - timestamp when sent from client
        latitude - latitude of the location
        longitude - longitude of the location
        direction - direction of the user
        file - photo file
        extension - extension of the photo file
        title - title of the report
        description - description of the report
        Returns:
        result with string type as a json or a xml format
